nodes.text: The Tally-house Meeting Halls was a building located in Hsskhor, the capital of the planet Trandosha. As their name implies, the halls served as a meeting place. Early in the year 22 BBY, the Tally-house Meeting Halls hosted a peace conference between the Trandoshans and the Wookiees from the neighboring world of Kashyyyk. One of the meeting rooms contained within the halls was decorated with mounted hunting trophies, including the head of a narglatch.
